data.text:
When we share honestly about our own experiences, we invite others to do the same. The connections we build in these moments of vulnerability are so powerful and so healing.

Tonight at 5pm ET, I hope you’ll join me for the BECOMING watch party. #WatchBecoming https://t.co/51nWi66k6S

RT @jleicole For #WHD2013, I ran 5.312 @CharityMiles to help @GirlUp educate girls in the developing world. #EveryMileMatters
